resources.string:
Enter a Chemical Equation to balance it
Example: C7H16 + O2 = H2O + CO2

Enter an Element to learn more about it
Example: Oxygen, Na, Aluminum

Enter a Unit to convert it
Example: 5g, 0.25 calories, 14 inches

Enter a Molecule to find its molar mass
Example: C7H16, 5g of CH3COOH

Enter a Mathematical Expression to evaluate it
Example: 5 - 7, (4+sqrt(pi * 8^2))/16
